issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
If you are using data binding in Alloy, and you have a dataFilter or dataTransform function defined in the XML, but not in the javaScript, the application will compile, but then error out.

Expecation:
Alloy should throw an error at compile time alert the developer that they need to create the function .
fields.summary: dataFilter and dataTransform attributes should be cross referenced to js file to ensure function exists
